title: Nidalee Too Freaking Strong
body:
We were nerfing some assasins but i think nidalee was left out. Her Q does so much damage early and late game. It gains more damage as it travels? Wtf, all nid does is stay back and poke with Q, it's slow traveling but you can't dodge it all day. You will eventually get sidetracked on something. When she hits it she goes cougar form and does over half your health. You throw a spear and it can do 500 damage to most mages.

I know what you are thinking, Build MR. I tried that but it doesn't work it still does too much damage. All i want is a Q nerf. Remove the scaling damage as it further travels.

replies.body: People would always ask why there are no ranged AD junglers. This is why.

But Nidalee is AP and ultra mobile.
*Faceplam.*

> [{quoted}](name=TotalJerk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vOuIRM5x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-17T00:19:32.608+0000)
>
> People would always ask why there are no ranged AD junglers. This is why.

Someone doesnt remember Crittlesticks {{item:3031}} {{champion:9}}
Lol
that 48% winrate is getting out of hand.

She's pretty god-awful in teamfights, but good luck ever chasing her. Add her to the list of champions you should never chase:

{{champion:27}} {{champion:35}}
Teemo should be there too haha

They just need to revert her hunting jungle creeps. I can deal with Nidalee in lane. But her having a safe laning phase where where has 5 chances to get fed no thank you. Especially when she gets even more control over dragon and baron. On top of this she can set a trap in order to get a MS boost when running into the lane for a gank. At least in lane you have a chance to see the spears coming and then a jungler to shut her down. In the jungle its a giant guessing game of where she is going to be and even as J4 with mobi boots I have struggled to keep up with her ganks.
Maybe an increase in  spear mana cost per use ala kogmaw or kassidin
Its not her spears that are the problem.  Its that she does more damage than assassins in cougar form, has heals, and is extremely safe.
Master of all trades classes are the worst.

It only does 500 damage? Are you playing against an AD nidalee?

AP nidalee still does over 1000 with her spears mid game

She needs 458 AP to deal 1000 damage at max range. 

If she has that much AP at mid game, I am afraid its not Nidalee's problem.

I insist that Nidalee's spears are OK, it's her heal what is broken. She can poke you all you want, but as soon as you poke her, she can heal it right back.
You mean the heal that restores 40 hp at lvl one and costs 1/4 of her mana?

But her spears are SO Painful. It does so much damage at lvl 1. I know it's a very slow projectile but it's bound to hit sometimes. Nidalee is the most annoying champ in my opinion. You go back and come back to lane and all of a sudden she hits a spear that makes your health drop to half in 1 shot. Then when you wanna farm she pounces your ass, and kills you. You can gank her but.... what am i saying you CAN'T gank her. She just pounces away in cougar form.

She heals for 45 + 50% AP. Assuming she has 40 AP, she is healing for 65 hp at the cost of 60 mana. 

Now, imagine you are against a Xerath. His Q deals 80 + 75% AP, which is equal to 110 dmg with 40 AP. If Nida has 30 magic resist, the actual damage taken is 85.  So basically Xerath is doinng 20 dmg per Q if Nidalee heals each time. Why is this frustrating? Because Nidalee can dodge Xerath's Q, but you can't make Nidalee miss her heal.

I still don't see what you're trying to tell me.  Xerathe is a long range mage, Nidalee is an assassin.  Her heal doesn't heal for very but, it costs quite a bit of mana, if she spams heal she goes oom.  If she lvls heal first then she doesn't do an extreme amount of damage.
And the xerath gets his mana back by AA. She comes into xerath, he can stun into her direction.
So im guessing everyone is agreeing to nerf nidalee. If not then just a tad.

such a freakin annoying champ her kit is just retarded....u mean to tell me a champ who needs to and one spear to combo all ur health, a champ who is extremely hard to catch if u arent a fuckin kassadin or some other ultra mobile champ, a fuckin champ who has incredible sticking power.........nid is a pain
Nerf nidalee now plz? Anyone? Who else bans nidalee when you are in ranked?

no no
you are wrong
She got reworked so she couldnt deal so much damage on such long range
So now instead of 75% of your health she will take just 60% now. And another 40% when she jumps on you over three walls, four towers and five nexuses.

They need to bring down her Panther burst a bit so she isn't as nukish. For one, making her Panther Burst a shortrange skillshot or simply not a targeted ability would be a start. I'd argue about her spears, but they're a lot easier to dodge now and they don't hurt AS bad as before. 

They could also make her heal like most other heals in the game because it's kind of absurd how much she can heal someone.

It's not that Nid is op, it's that she is one of if not THE most annoying and unfun champions to play against in the game. Nobody wants Nidalee to be good because when she is it ruins the game for all 5 people on the other team.
This is how you fix Nidalee.  Make her Pounce cost 60 mana.  Bam. Fixed.

She pokes pretty hard so all your team needs to do is hard engage. She does mostly single target damage and has to get within melee range to do most of it. From the moment it launches to the time it scales to max range, you also have plenty of visual time to try to dodge it.
Nidalee is balanced. If you want to hate, Kalista, Zed, and Lee Sin are some good champs to start off on.
Kalista i agree with. She just builds a Runaans Hurricane and she can rekt your face. The more spears you have the easier kalista can kill you with.
